item.title: Introduction to Cumulocity
item.description: Cumulocity gives you very fast visibility and control over your remote assets, be these houses, cars, machines or any other assets that you need to manage.

item.title: Cumulocity's domain model
item.description: The following sections describe several concepts related to devices and assets in Cumulocity.

item.title: Interfacing devices
item.description: To interface IoT data sources such as devices and external IT systems, Cumulocity provides agents. Agents are software components that enable a centralized perspective on all aspects and central operation of the IoT network.

item.title: Real-time processing
item.description: Cumulocity allows developers and power users to run real-time IoT business logic inside Cumulocity based on a high-level real-time processing language. This section introduces the basic concepts of real-time processing and shows how you can develop your own functional business logic at Cumulocity.

item.title: Developing applications
item.description: Cumulocity is designed to accommodate arbitrary vertical IoT applications in addition to its generic functionality. This section introduces the basic concepts around applications in Cumulocity.
